Package us.teaminceptus.novaconomy.api.economy.market

Interface NovaMarket

public interface NovaMarket
Represents the Novaconomy Market
Since:
1.7.1

    • getPrice

      double getPrice(@NotNull @NotNull Material m) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Fetches the price of a Material on the Market.
      Parameters:
      m - Material to fetch
      Returns:
      Price of the Material
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the Material is not on the Market

    • getPrice

      default double getPrice(@NotNull @NotNull Material m, @Nullable @Nullable Economy econ) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Fetches the price of a Material on the Market, factoring an Economy's conversion scale.
      Parameters:
      m - Material to fetch
      econ - Economy to use
      Returns:
      Price of the Material for the Economy
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the Material is not on the Market

      Parameters:
      m - Material to fetch
      scale - Scale to use
      Returns:
      Price of the Material for the Economy
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the Material is not on the Market

    • buy

      @NotNull @NotNull Receipt buy(@NotNull @NotNull OfflinePlayer buyer, @NotNull @NotNull Material m, int amount, @NotNull @NotNull Economy econ) throws IllegalArgumentException, CancellationException
      Buys a Material from the Market. This method does not add the material to their inventory, only makes a receipt.
      Parameters:
      buyer - Player buying the Material
      m - Material to buy
      amount - Amount of the Material to buy
      econ - Economy to buy with
      Returns:
      Receipt of the Transaction
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if amount is not positive, not enough stock, or player does not have enough money
      CancellationException - if PlayerMarketPurchaseEvent was cancelled

    • isMarketEnabled

      boolean isMarketEnabled()
      Whether Novaconomy Market features are currently enabled.
      Returns:
      true if enabled, else false

      long getMaxPurchases()
      Fetches the maximum amount of purchases a player can make in a single day (20 minutes).
      Returns:
      Maximum amount of purchases, or -1 if unlimited

    • setMaxPurchases

      Sets the maximum amount of purchases a player can make in a single day (20 minutes).
      Parameters:
      maxPurchases - Maximum amount of Purchases (-1 for unlimited)

    • isMarketMembershipEnabled

      boolean isMarketMembershipEnabled()

      Whether the Market Membership feature is enabled.

      If enabled, players will have to pay a one-time fee to gain access to the Novaconomy Market.

      Returns:
      true if enabled, else false

    • setMarketMembershipEnabled

      void setMarketMembershipEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Sets whether the Market Membership feature is enabled.
      Parameters:
      enabled - true if enabled, else false
      See Also:
      • isMarketMembershipEnabled()

    • getMarketMembershipCost

      double getMarketMembershipCost()
      Fetches the one-time fee a player must pay to gain access to the Novaconomy Market. Default is 10000.0.
      Returns:
      Market Membership Cost
